item.title: Bookmarks are no longer a thing
item.description: I am not sure about you, but I have been carrying along a huge assortment of bookmarks that I don’t use and often forget why I even saved them. It appears to have become a habit, and like many habits, it has outlived its usefulness. The first bookmarks appeared in early browsers in 1992 and 1993.
